import { useState } from "react"; import CheckCircleIcon from "@mui/icons-material/CheckCircle"; import EditIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Edit"; import DeleteIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Delete"; import {db} from "../../firebase.js" import { collection, query, onSnapshot, doc, updateDoc, deleteDoc, QuerySnapshot } from "firebase/firestore" const Todoitem = (props) => { deleteDoc(doc(db, "todos", "6OX6qShV2yzdYEBIjhla")); return (

{props.id}

) } export default Todoitem
